title: Freehub Film Festival is Open to Submissions
content:
Freehub, a great independent media company, is now accepting submissions for its annual film festival. The print magazine is inviting riders, creators, and storytellers alike to submit their current or upcoming films to the Freehub PRESENTS film festival. This includes anything from passion projects, to rich storytelling, and creative short films that are not yet released online. Check out the full 411 at Freehub.

The post Freehub Film Festival is Open to Submissions appeared first on The Radavist.
author: John Watson
